attributes.action: Replace glass bottles and glasses with plastic bottles and polycarbonate glasses in Night Clubs and Late Night Bars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop using glass in nightclubs and late night bar, instead replace with polycarbonate glasses and plastice bottles.  5.500 REPORTED vicious glassing/bottling attacks per year, not to mention accidental injuries, last year government compensation paid out 4.5 million. Cost to NHS and police immense, cost to victim immeasurable.
